枏字的基本解释

枏
nán
同“楠”。

枏字的汉语字典释义

[①]［nán］
［《廣韻》那含切，平覃，泥。］
亦作“枏1”。亦作“柟1”。
常绿大乔木。叶椭圆形或长披针形，革质，下面有毛。花小，绿色。结浆果，蓝黑色。木材坚密芳香，为贵重的建筑材料，也可供造船用。产于云南、四川、贵州、湖南等地。

枏字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　枏； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页515第07
【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?那含切，音南。【說文】木名。梅也。【史記·貨殖傳】江南出枏梓。【山海經】虖勺之山，其木多梓枏。【任昉·述異記】黃金山有枏木，一年東榮西枯，一年西榮東枯，張華謂之交讓木。　又【爾雅·釋木】梅，枏。【郭註】似杏而酢。【陸疏廣要】《爾雅》之梅枏，乃似豫章者，古稱楩楠豫章，景純不得以似杏實酢解之。　又【廣韻】汝鹽切【集韻】【韻會】如占切【正韻】而占切，?冉平聲。又【廣韻】而琰切，音冉。義?同。　或作柟。俗作楠，非。

Basic explanation of words
Shao
nán
Same as "Nan".
Shao
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [nán]
["Guangyun" Na Hanqie, Pingtan, Clay. ]
Also known as "枏1". Also known as "Nan 1".
Large evergreen tree. The leaves are oval or long lanceolate, leathery, with hairy undersides. The flowers are small and green. Berry, blue-black. Wood is dense and fragrant. It is a valuable building material and can also be used for shipbuilding. Produced in Yunnan, Sichuan, Guizhou, Hunan and other places.
Shao
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　枏; Kangxi Strokes: 8; Page Number: Page 515 No. 07
[Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? That Hanqie, Yinnan. [Said the text] Wooden name. Mei Ye. [Historical Records · Huo Shi Chuan] Jiangnan came out of Nanzi. [Shan Hai Jing] The mountain of the shoal, its woods are many zi 枏. [Ren Fang · Shuyi Ji] There is a wood in the Golden Mountain, which grows in the east and wilt in the west in one year, and decays in the west and wither away in the west.　[Erya·Shimu] Mei, Nan. [Guo's Note] Like an apricot but nourishing. [Lu Shuguangyao] The plum lotus in "Er Ya" is like the Yuzhang. It was called the Yuzhang Nannan Yuzhang in ancient times, and Jingchun could not solve it with the real apricot.　[Guangyun] Ru Yanqie [Jiyun] [Rhyme] As if Zhanqie [Zhengyun] and Zhanqie,? Ran Pingsheng. [Guang Yun] and Yan cut, Yin Ran. Righteous? Same.　Or Zuo Nan. Popular as Nan, non.
